metadata.title: CVE-2015-8759 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the typoLink function in TYPO36.2.x before 6.2.16 and 7.x before 7.6.1 allows remote authenticatededitors to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a link field.

criterions.comment: typo3-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
